FuncDef: This command enables the use of the Remote LFA algorithm in the LFA SPF calculation in this OSPF or OSPF3 instance.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the integer used to limit the search of candidate P and Q nodes in the remote LFA by setting the maximum IGP cost from the router performing the remote LFA calculation to the candidate P or Q node. Values-0 to 4294967295. ParamDefault: Default- 4261412864
